tool_description: This API scraps news related to Web 3.0 , NFT, Blockchain, Cryptocurrencies etc.. from various news portals like  NY Times, The Hindu, Indian Express, The Wall Street Journal, Business Standard and many more.
name: Blockchain News
title: Blockchain News

api_list.name: Get News from specific News portal
api_list.description: Get News from specific News portal i.e. NDTV, NY Times
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blockchain-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/NDTV"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blockchain-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blockchain-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blockchain-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Web 3 news
